mapper.select: SELECT id, phone, login_type AS loginType, open_id AS openId, nickname, avatar_url AS avatarUrl, `level`, birthday, gender, gmt_last_login AS gmtLastLogin, last_login_ip AS lastLoginIp, `status`, gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, gmt_create AS gmtCreate FROM unimall_user WHERE phone = #{phone} AND `password` = #{cryptPassword}
SELECT u.id, u.balance, u.integral, ic.invite_code inviteCode FROM unimall_user u left join unimall_invite_code ic on u.id=ic.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}

SELECT id, invite_code AS inviteCode, gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, gmt_create AS gmtCreate FROM unimall_user WHERE 1 = 1
AND invite_code like concat(concat("%",#{invite_code}),"%")
